title: Himi 329
lyrics:
7.7.7.7. Loua
1.
’Oku taau mo e kakai,
‘Oku tui mo’oni,
Ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
Ke nau fe’ofa’aki;
Ko ia ‘oku mau fai,
‘A e fakataha ni,
Ko e katoanga ‘ofa
‘Eiki kiate koe.
2.
’Oku mau ‘amanaki,
Sīsū kiate koe;
Te tau fakataha ni,
‘O hangē ko ho’ tala;
Ha’u ki ho kakai tui,
Ha’u ki he kakai kumi,
Mo ke fakamo’ui,
‘A homau laumālie.
3.
Ha’u ‘i he Laumālie,
Pea ngāue mālohi,
Pea tafi ke ma’a
‘A homau laumālie,
Ke mau teunga’ia ai,
Ki he fu’u katoanga;
‘E fai ma’u ‘i hēvani,
Ko e ta’ane lahi. *
